text.en: By the force of the truth of the precious Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: könchok rinchen sum gyi den tob kyi

text.en: Throughout the succession of all my lives to come,
In whatever place that I may reside,
text.en-trans: dak ni gangdu nepé sachok der

text.en: May the teachings of the Buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: sangye tenpa dar zhing gyepar shok

text.en: May all sentient beings enjoy happiness and fulfillment!
text.en-trans: semchen tamché dé zhing kyipar shok

text.en: May they always engage in the practice of the holy Dharma!
text.en-trans: taktu dampé chö la chöpar shok

text.en: May the two aims be spontaneously fulfilled and may we realize the two kāyas!
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhündrub ku nyi ngöngyur shok

text.en: May the teachings of the barbaric māras disappear!
text.en-trans: lalo dü kyi tenpa nubpar shok

text.en: Through the blazing splendor of the Great Orgyen's activity,
May the study and practice of Dharma spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: shedrub tenpa chok tar gyepar shok
